name: Forsaken Hymn
description: Within this ruined world of breaths and glass, where prayers go unanswered and vows are challenged, the only thing one can have faith in is this: a single breath can change one's life.

skinlines.name: Broken Covenant
skinlines.description: For years the Aspirant congregation has fought the Neverghaast sect over Aspira, the breath of life. To the congregation, Aspira is a gift one returns upon death to enter the afterlife. But the Neverghaast, cursed with an eternal thirst for breaths, believe there is only one life and it must be lived to excess. The war rages on, with no end in sight...
